name: Twelve Days, One Night
description:
Twelve days ago you asked for a Christmas wish list from your true love.  After the year the two of you have been through, you said you would make the holiday extra special.  Never mind that you can barely afford the rent for this small, aging house.  Never mind that your true love has rather extravagant tastes.  Your true love is currently on a red-eye flight from Albuquerque and will be here around dawn.  You've spent the past twelve days getting everything necessary to create the Christmas of your true love's dreams.  You are determined to make each gift ready and under your tree by morning.

Created with Adventuron for the Adventuron Christmas Jam.
